00057 void CDisplaySettingsButton::optionToggled(int ID){
00058     m_popup->setItemChecked( ID, !(m_popup->isItemChecked(ID)));
00059     if (!m_popup->text(ID).isEmpty())
00060       *(m_dict[m_popup->text(ID)]) =  m_popup->isItemChecked(ID);
00061     emit sigChanged();
00062 }

00065 int CDisplaySettingsButton::populateMenu(){
00066 
00067     int ret = 0;
00068 
00069     m_popup->clear();
00070     m_popup->insertTitle(i18n("Display options"));
00071     m_popup->setCheckable(true);
00072 
00073   ret += addMenuEntry(i18n("Use linebreaks"), &m_displaySettings->lineBreaks, true);
00074     ret += addMenuEntry(i18n("Show versenumbers"), &m_displaySettings->verseNumbers, true);
00075 
00076     ret += addMenuEntry(i18n("Show headings"),  &m_moduleSettings->headings,
00077         isOptionAvailable(CSwordBackend::headings));    
00078     ret += addMenuEntry(i18n("Show footnotes"), &m_moduleSettings->footnotes,
00079         isOptionAvailable(CSwordBackend::footnotes ));
00080     ret += addMenuEntry(i18n("Show Strong's Numbers"), &m_moduleSettings->strongNumbers,
00081         isOptionAvailable(CSwordBackend::strongNumbers ));
00082 
00083     ret += addMenuEntry(i18n("Show morphologic tags"),&m_moduleSettings->morphTags,
00084         isOptionAvailable(CSwordBackend::morphTags ));
00085     ret += addMenuEntry(i18n("Show lemmas"),&m_moduleSettings->lemmas,
00086         isOptionAvailable(CSwordBackend::lemmas ));
00087     ret += addMenuEntry(i18n("Show Hebrew vowel points"), &m_moduleSettings->hebrewPoints,
00088         isOptionAvailable(CSwordBackend::hebrewPoints ));
00089     ret += addMenuEntry(i18n("Show Hebrew cantillation marks"), &m_moduleSettings->hebrewCantillation,
00090         isOptionAvailable(CSwordBackend::hebrewCantillation ));
00091     ret += addMenuEntry(i18n("Show Greek accents"), &m_moduleSettings->greekAccents,
00092         isOptionAvailable(CSwordBackend::greekAccents ));
00093     ret += addMenuEntry(i18n("Use alternative textual variant"), &m_moduleSettings->textualVariants,
00094         isOptionAvailable(CSwordBackend::greekAccents ));
00095 
00096     return ret;
00097 }

00100 int CDisplaySettingsButton::addMenuEntry( const QString name, const bool* option, const bool available){
00101     if (available){
00102         m_dict.insert( name, option);
00103         m_popup->setItemChecked(m_popup->insertItem( name ), *option );
00104         return 1;
00105     }
00106     return 0;
00107 }

00109 bool CDisplaySettingsButton::isOptionAvailable( const CSwordBackend::FilterOptions option){
00110     bool ret = false;
00111     for (m_modules.first(); m_modules.current(); m_modules.next())
00112         ret = ret || m_modules.current()->has(option);
00113     return ret;
00114 }
